name: paymentAuthorizationViewController(_:didSelect:completion:)
desc: Tells the delegate that the user changed the payment method, and asks for an updated payment request. DeprecatedUse paymentAuthorizationViewController(_:didSelect:handler:) instead.
declaration:
optional func paymentAuthorizationViewController(_ controller: PKPaymentAuthorizationViewController, 
                                       didSelect paymentMethod: PKPaymentMethod, 
                                      completion: @escaping ([PKPaymentSummaryItem]) -> Void)
